reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big improvement over older router
reviews.reviewText: I was changing from a local Internet supplier to Spectrum to get a much faster and reliable connection. That meant a new updated router was needed. Researched several and landed on the Nighthawk. It was easy to install with the app and we are getting much better internet connection and speeds exceeding 300. (We were only getting about 20 before.) Only had the router up for a couple of days but it seems to be performing very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up, fast
reviews.reviewText: SUMMARY: This router is easy to set up and has great speed.DETAIL: I've used a lot of routers over the years, and I've had great results with Netgear routers. When my last router died, I looked around and settled on this one. The price was higher than some other options, but lower than the most expensive routers.Of all the routers I've had, this one is the easiest to set up. There is a useful Nighhawk app you can use, but it's not requried.We sometimes stream on multiple devices, and the router has been working great, in terms of speed and distance to devices. It has four antennas on top.There are two physical buttons on the top of the router that are very useful. You can use one to instantly the router's Wi-Fi transmission on or off.The other button make is very easy to quickly add devices (it uses the Wi-Fi Protected Setup process, known as WPS).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Item seemed to work well but I returned because it didn’t take care of the issue we were having with our wifi printers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very decent wifi for small home.
reviews.reviewText: Does what it needs to. But if you have a multi-floor home will still need a range extender. I just recently bought the newest Orbi set up. And love it way better. Comes with it's own range extender satellites.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a great deal at a decent price.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and reachs the second floor of our home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set-up; works great
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to set up — just followed the instructions in the downloaded app. Work was took about 30 minutes. Biggest challenge has been uncovering all the devices that need to connect to the new router. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Net gear is dramatically over technical
reviews.reviewText: I hooked up the router - the WiFi, which is why I wanted it was mediocre at best. i live in a 1000 ft Sq apartment. WiFi was spotty at best. There are many user options for unit - and support requires payment for Tech Specialist - which I paid for. I have been a Tech Specialist for more than 50 years on computer stuff - I did not feel I was actually getting support to make the unit work. If you know specifically what you are doing with Net Gear products I am sure it is a good product. For us folks who have not used this product it is like walking across a lake expecting to walk on the water - I just do not know where the stepping rocks are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have this router set up downstairs near my modem. Signal is strong downstairs and good upstairs. I do have two ASUS Wifi 6 routers upstairs, one as a bridge in my master bedroom and one as a repeater in my office/game room. They connected easily and have remained connected since setup, each with a strong signal. Very pleased, especially at this price point.
